definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: The peacock displayed its fine tail feathers for us.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀爲我們展示了它美麗的尾羽。

sentences.english: The long tail pointed tail, extend like an arrow.
sentences.chinese: 尾型尖長，中央尾羽延長如箭。

sentences.english: The peacock displayed its fine tail feathers.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀炫耀其漂亮的尾羽。

sentences.english: Wings black with conspicuous white bar and white tips to secondaries and tertials .
sentences.chinese: 尖直長的尾羽黑白相間，翼黑色，有明顯的白紋。

sentences.english: Black tail feathers below the two yellow Jiaoya still long with a pinch of clutter canescens.
sentences.chinese: 黑色的尾羽下面，兩隻黃腳丫還長着一撮雜亂的灰毛。

sentences.english: The male's tail feathers are twice the length of its body and end in disc-shaped 'spatules'.
sentences.chinese: 雄性尾羽的長度兩倍於體長並以“叉向抹刀狀”告終。

sentences.english: Outer tail feathers basally white. Dark breast sharply demarcated from white abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 外側尾羽基部白色，深色的胸與白色腹部截然分開。

sentences.english: The tail feathers are dark blue at their bases, shading to pale blue at their tips.
sentences.chinese: 尾羽的根部呈深藍色，到了尾尖就漸變成淡藍色。

definition: comb (fleshy crest on a bird's head)
